aka: The Woman Everyone Wanted to Kill
trans_title: The Woman Everyone Wanted to Kill
introduction: SYNOPSISSeol Hee-ju, the daughter-in-law of the chairman of Myungwangsung Group and the wife of Koh Bong-sik, the president of Myungwangsung Motors, is found dead from a fatal knife stab in the chest. This tragedy sheds light on one bourgeois family's corrupt secrets and labor-management disputes within the corporation and brands Seol Hee-ju as the woman everyone wanted to kill. Hee-joo's lover Oh Min-soo becomes a prime suspect but the case soon becomes deadlocked. Hee-joo was a student activist who became disillusioned by the cause and gave into Bong-sik's persistent courtship. Marriage for her was just the beginning of another struggle. But when the passion in their marriage dies down all too quickly, she falls into a state of delusion and realizes that her plans are impossible to carry out. She resorts to the only one thing that can save her.故事冥王星matmyeoneuri集团董事长，发现总统夫人gobongsik seolhui刀冥王星价格汽车公司的心脏与机身右侧。这一消息获得的关注光的资产阶级内部调查的腐败和劳资纠纷问题，并发现世界原来是一个女人所有的seolhui就像和杀人。而且只涨线为爱侣seolhui注意力哦Minsu事件沉醉于一个迷宫。Seolhui，当你跌倒在大学，但深深卷入满足学生运动揭示砾岩2年gobongsik结婚，他的执着求爱。但她的婚姻只EGEN被规划为新的斗争。但回头看看自己上瘾妄想的沼泽那个炎热的激情seolhui电影下车几个蜻蜓的丈夫开始感觉到一个事实，即所有的规划几乎是不可能召回作为一种escape'm到舍己的唯一解决方案。
